content.query:
IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM sys.tables
    WHERE name = 'SGPSchool' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('transform')
)
BEGIN
    EXEC('DROP TABLE transform.SGPSchool')
END


SELECT [SchoolYear]
      ,[OrganizationLevel]
      ,[County]
      ,[ESDName]
      ,[ESDOrganizationID]
      ,coalesce([Local District Code], [DistrictCode]) as [DistrictCode]
      ,coalesce([Local District], [DistrictName]) as [DistrictName]
      ,[DistrictOrganizationId]
      ,[SchoolCode]
      ,coalesce([School Name], [SchoolName]) as [SchoolName]
      ,[SchoolOrganizationid]
      ,[CurrentSchoolType]
	  ,[StudentGroupCategory]
      ,c.[StudentGroupType]
      ,c.[StudentGroup]
      ,d.[GradeLevel]
      ,[Subject]
      ,[Suppression]
      ,[MedianSGP]
      ,[DataAsOf]
Into [transform].[SGPSchool]
FROM [staging].[SGP] a
LEFT JOIN [staging].[CharterSchoolDirectory] b ON a.[SchoolCode] = b.[School Code]
Left JOIN [dim].[StudentGroup] c ON a.[StudentGroup] = c.[StudentGroupKey]
LEFT JOIN [dim].[GradeLevel] d on a.[GradeLevel] = d.[GradeLevelKey]
where a.[StudentGroup] not like 'Non%' and a.[OrganizationLevel] = 'School'
